top_comments.comment: Did not expect to be taught a lesson about what zombie brains do to feeding mechanisms. Obligatory "10 out of 10 would learn again" comment here.
he should try look at guns from Enlisted i think that would be fun

comments_since_last_sample.body: Please get this guy to review DayZ's guns. It has some super nice animations and realistic physics.
Reacting to the guns of the Borderlands games would be cool
Definitely a game you all could get a number of episodes out of would be Payday 2.
You should react to destiny 2 weapons
